data.name: Solitaire Jester
data.description:
Sit back and relax while playing solitaire like you never have before. With Solitaire Jester, you’ll enjoy your own private library, complete with a cozy fireplace, while you hone your card playing skills with this classic game. 

Gear VR controller support is coming soon.

translations.long_description: Rilassati con un solitario come mai prima d'ora. Con Solitaire Jester ti invitiamo a prendere una pausa dagli affanni della giornata e a rifugiarti nel tuo santuario personale. Ti sentirai trasportato in una biblioteca privata, con un accogliente caminetto, dove potrai perfezionare le tue abilità nel gioco delle carte grazie a questo grande classico.
translations.short_description: Relax with solitaire like never before possible. With Solitaire Jester we invite you to take some time off from your busy day and enjoy your own sanctuary. Teleport to a private library with a cozy fireplace and hone your card playing skills with this classic game.

translations.long_description: Relax with solitaire like never before possible. With Solitaire Jester we invite you to take some time off from your busy day and enjoy your own sanctuary. Teleport to a private library with a cozy fireplace and hone your card playing skills with this classic game
translations.short_description: Relax with solitaire like never before possible. With Solitaire Jester we invite you to take some time off from your busy day and enjoy your own sanctuary. Teleport to a private library with a cozy fireplace and hone your card playing skills with this classic game.

translations.long_description: ソリティアをプレーして、今までにないリラックス感を体感しましょう。「ソリティア ジェスター」では忙しい日々から少しだけ時間をとって、あなたのだけの聖域を楽しむことができます。暖かな暖炉のある書斎へとテレポートして、この王道ゲームでカードの腕を磨きましょう。
translations.short_description: Relax with solitaire like never before possible. With Solitaire Jester we invite you to take some time off from your busy day and enjoy your own sanctuary. Teleport to a private library with a cozy fireplace and hone your card playing skills with this classic game.

translations.long_description: Zo'n rustgevend potje solitaire heb je nog nooit gespeeld. Met Solitaire Jester nodigen we je uit je drukke dag even te onderbreken en je eigen rustmoment te creëren. Teleporteer naar een privébibliotheek met een knapperend haardvuur en stel je vaardigheden op de proef met dit klassieke spel.

translations.long_description: ќтдыхайте вместе с солитером так, как никогда раньше. Solitaire Jester позволит вам немного отвлечьс€ от дневных забот и насладитьс€ собственным обществом. ѕеренеситесь в домашнюю библиотеку с уютным камином и практикуйте игровые навыки вместе с этой классической игрой.
translations.short_description: Relax with solitaire like never before possible. With Solitaire Jester we invite you to take some time off from your busy day and enjoy your own sanctuary. Teleport to a private library with a cozy fireplace and hone your card playing skills with this classic game.

translations.long_description: Relájate como nunca con el solitario. Con Solitaire Jester, te invitamos a que te tomes un descanso de tu ajetreado día y disfrutes de tu propio santuario. Teletranspórtate a una biblioteca íntima con una chimenea acogedora y agudiza tus habilidades en las cartas con este juego tan clásico.

changelog.change_log:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- You can now use the button on a gamepad to interact.

- Fixed an issue with the camera that affected some users.
- Bugs and performance fixes.
- New card backs.
-Fixed bug in three card draw animation

-Added Three Card Draw
-Added background music
-Updated and added sounds
